# AI Services Company - Premium Next.js Website

## Project Overview
High-end, premium website for an AI services company built with Next.js 14, featuring immersive 3D visuals, smooth animations, and world-class design.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- Three.js & React Three Fiber (3D elements)
- next-seo (SEO optimization)

## Design Philosophy
- Dark, cinematic backgrounds
- Neon/gradient highlights
- Premium, futuristic aesthetics
- Smooth, intentional animations
- Immersive 3D experiences

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js App Router pages
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/lib` - Utility functions and helpers
- `/public` - Static assets

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on performance and smooth animations
- Maintain premium, professional feel
- Ensure responsive design across all devices
- Optimize for SEO
- Keep code clean and well-documented
